clusterdescription.name: Emerald GPU cluster
clusterdescription.description: Emerald is an HP system with 372 NVIDIA GPUs. It is housed at the STFC Rutherford Appleton Laboratory.

clusterdescription.name: Iridis CPU/GPU cluster
clusterdescription.description: Iridis is a cluster with approximately 1000 Intel Nehalem compute nodes each with two 4-core processors. It is the supercomputer of the University of Southampton.
